content: lion brand pattern # 70354ad skill level easy wool-ease® chunky article #630 5 colors 1 ball each *shown in moss mulberry amber eggplant indigo * crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm gauge 1 motif = 5 x 5 in 12 5 x 12 5 cm work round 1 of each motif with a work rounds 2 and 3 with the specified contrasting color make 16 motifs sew motifs together to finish see blossom scarf 1 for the vanna s choice version 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/blossom-scarf-2
